channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: From LA wildfires to hurricanes, immigrants help rebuild after disasters. Some may face deportation
item.description: After disasters like the wildfires in Los Angeles happen, much of the rebuilding work is done by Latino immigrant workers, many in the country illegally.

item.title: As wildfires linger, focus turns to rebuilding Los Angeles’ leveled neighborhoods
Inside the monumental effort behind LA’s firefight, from strategy to meals and laundry
